lccdd.comment:
Tracker support and service materials for ePIC-craterlake tracking geometry. See https://indico.bnl.gov/event/19854/#1-updated-epic-tracking-config Silicon tracker: the same effective thickness parameters from previous versions, routing changed MPGD: estimated by M. Posik ┌───── B │ / A / │ │ ─2C─2B─2A─\ Outer Support Cone /─2A─2B─2C─2D─2E─┘ Ecal pfRICH \ / \ PST / \─1C──1B──1A─\ ----------------/─1A────1B─────1C────/ Outer Support Cone \ inner support / \ cone / =============== L2
N (-) (+) P ──·──·──·──·──·────·──·──·──·──·── x ──·──·──·──·──·──·──·──·──·────·──·──·──·──·──·── z ######## Updates ######## 09.2025: the inner vertex barrel support (up to the first disk) are replaced by a more detailed design in vertex_barrel_support.xml 10.2025: add CF cylinder on the central region to form the one-piece PST.
